product_name: Columbia Cubist III Insulated Jacket - Men's
long_description: Brave the elements while skiing in the Columbia Cubist(TM) III insulated jacket. Its thermal reflective technology, warm polyester insulation and waterproof barrier keep winter weather out. Omni-Tech(R) waterproof, breathable nylon shell resists abrasion and breathes well; seams are sealed in critical places to keep moisture from entering. Omni-Heat(TM) thermal reflective lining features small silver dots that reflect heat back to your body while dissipating moisture and excess heat to keep you comfortable. 80g partially recycled polyester insulation keeps you toasty warm on cold days. Includes zippered hand pockets, a zippered chest pocket, a ski pass pocket, goggles pocket and internal security pocket. Adjustable, detachable hood; adjustable powder skirt.
short_description: Brave the elements while skiing in the Columbia Cubist(TM) III insulated jacket. Its thermal reflective technology, warm polyester insulation and waterproof barrier keep winter weather out.
